analysis_racial: The racial bias in this job posting is negative, as it discourages candidates of certain racial groups from applying by requiring a native English speaker and implying a specific cultural background.
text:
Company: Johnson and Sons

Job Title: Systems Administrator/Business Analyst

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Systems Administrator/Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background and excellent analytical skills.

Responsibilities:
- Maintain and optimize our computer systems and networks
- Analyze business operations and develop solutions to improve efficiency
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement new systems and processes
- Provide technical support to end-users

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 3+ years of experience in systems administration and business analysis
- Strong knowledge of computer systems, networks, and software applications
- Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment

Note: We prefer candidates who have always spoken English natively and have a global perspective on business practices.
